price: 83. Waarlijk, dit is ons beloofd, ons en onze vaders voor (ons)! Dit zijn slechts de verhalen van de ouderen!”
arabic: لَقَدۡ وُعِدۡنَا نَحۡنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَٰذَا مِن قَبۡلُ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: laqad wuʿid'nā naḥnu waābāunā hādhā min qablu in hādhā illā asāṭīru al-awalīna
